description: Analyzes uploaded vintage, damaged, or blurry photos, constructs a detailed restoration prompt preserving identity, pose, and composition, and generates a crystal-clear 8K restored image using the image generation tool with the original as reference input.

example_response.restoration_analysis: Detailed analysis of the quality issues detected in the uploaded photo
example_response.restoration_prompt: The detailed prompt constructed and used to generate the restored image
example_response.status: Status of the restoration - success or failure
